actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

official_title: Providing for a joint session of Congress to be held in New York City, New York.

summary.text: Calls for a joint session of Congress in New York City, New York, during the 107th Congress at such date, time, and location as the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the President Pro Tempore of the Senate may jointly select, for the purpose of conducting such business as the Speaker and the President Pro Tempore may consider appropriate.

titles.title: Providing for a joint session of Congress to be held in New York City, New York.
